name: Chart
description: Represents a chart object in a workbook.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The unique id of chart.

properties.name: axes
properties.description: Represents chart axes.

properties.name: dataLabels
properties.description: Represents the datalabels on the chart.

properties.name: height
properties.description: Represents the height, in points, of the chart object.

properties.name: left
properties.description: The distance, in points, from the left side of the chart to the worksheet origin.

properties.name: legend
properties.description: Represents the legend for the chart.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Represents the name of a chart object.

properties.name: series
properties.description: Represents either a single series or collection of series in the chart.

properties.name: title
properties.description: Represents the title of the specified chart, including the text, visibility, position, and formating of the title.

properties.name: top
properties.description: Represents the distance, in points, from the top edge of the object to the top of row 1 (on a worksheet) or the top of the chart area (on a chart).

properties.name: width
properties.description: Represents the width, in points, of the chart object.

properties.name: showAllFieldButtons
properties.description: Represents whether to display all field buttons on a PivotChart.

properties.name: showDataLabelsOverMaximum
properties.description: Represents whether to to show the data labels when the value is greater than the maximum value on the value axis.

properties.name: categoryLabelLevel
properties.description: Returns or sets a ChartCategoryLabelLevel enumeration constant referring to

properties.name: style
properties.description: Returns or sets the chart style for the chart. ReadWrite.

properties.name: displayBlanksAs
properties.description: Returns or sets the way that blank cells are plotted on a chart. ReadWrite.

properties.name: plotBy
properties.description: Returns or sets the way columns or rows are used as data series on the chart. ReadWrite.

properties.name: plotVisibleOnly
properties.description: True┬áif only visible cells are plotted.┬áFalse┬áif both visible and hidden cells are plotted. ReadWrite.

properties.name: seriesNameLevel
properties.description: Returns or sets a ChartSeriesNameLevel enumeration constant referring to

properties.name: chartType
properties.description: Represents the type of the chart.

properties.name: format
properties.description: Encapsulates the format properties for the chart area.

properties.name: pivotOptions
properties.description: Encapsulates the options for the pivot chart.

properties.name: worksheet
properties.description: The worksheet containing the current chart.

properties.name: plotArea
properties.description: Represents the plotArea for the chart.

methods.name: setData
methods.description: Resets the source data for the chart.

parameters.name: sourceData
parameters.description: The range object corresponding to the source data.

parameters.name: seriesBy
parameters.description: Specifies the way columns or rows are used as data series on the chart. Can be one of the following: Auto (default), Rows, and Columns.

methods.name: setPosition
methods.description: Positions the chart relative to cells on the worksheet.
methods.signature: setPosition(startCell: Range or string, endCell: Range or string)

parameters.name: startCell
parameters.description: The start cell. This is where the chart will be moved to. The start cell is the top-left or top-right cell, depending on the user's right-to-left display settings.

parameters.name: endCell
parameters.description: (Optional) The end cell. If specified, the chart's width and height will be set to fully cover up this cell/range.

methods.name: getImage
methods.description: Renders the chart as a base64-encoded image by scaling the chart to fit the specified dimensions.
methods.signature: getImage(height: number, width: number, fittingMode: string)

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: (Optional) The desired height of the resulting image.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: (Optional) The desired width of the resulting image.

parameters.name: fittingMode
parameters.description: (Optional) The method used to scale the chart to the specified to the specified dimensions (if both height and width are set).

methods.name: activate
methods.description: Activate the chart in the Excel UI.
